name: Charlie: The Legend
storyline:
Play with your friends and try to defeat Charlie and take him back to hell or play as Charlie and prevent the survivors from escaping.

As a survivor you will have two ways to finish the game successfully. Escape the map alive or defeat Charlie.
To escape the map you will have to follow several steps that will be different depending on the map you are on. Knowing how to play your cards correctly and not wasting time will be the key to achieve it.
If time is running out or you don't see the possibility of escaping the map, there is also the option of defeating Charlie.

Playing as Charlie you will have all the powers of a dark demon in your hands. But obviously you will have to save your strength to avoid being unarmed in front of the players who decide to confront you.
You will also have the extra help of the "Scavengers" that you can summon at certain points of the map and that will keep the survivors "busy" while you carry out your evil plans.

Will you accept the challenge to become a true legend?
summary: Equip yourself with the best weapons and get ready to face your worst fears... Charlie: The Legend aspires to become a must have for all those who enjoy multiplayer horror games. Charlie is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror video game in which 4 Survivors must face a diabolical doll possessed by a demon. It's up to you! Play as Charlie and defeat the other players or take on Charlie as a survivor.
